EmailTemplate.subject: Access to Honeywell Training has been denied
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
Your account information entered does not provide sufficient data to enable access to the training portal and class registration.
• Your information must be associated with an active company account, in the Honeywell system • Your company’s account must be established with Honeywell, before employees can setup and link their accounts • The company account identifies and establishes the products and services we provide to your organization • Please ensure all your account data is complete, as this is associated to products and services you are eligible to receive, incomplete data delays access to class registration • Note - the primary email address entered on your account, must be a company email address • Email addresses such as Gmail, Yahoo, Hotmail, etc., are not identified company addresses and delay your request for access
Please contact us to see if we can resolve any discrepancies in the information and provide access to Honeywell Training.
Honeywell – CAE Training Alliance
